author: Special Correspondent
text:
An idol of Nammazhwar being placed at the feet of Namperumal at Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple in Srirangam on Thursday.— Photo: M. Srinath

A large number of devotees offered worship to Namperumal on the occasion of Nammazhvar Moksham of the Vaikunta Ekadasi festival on Thursday.

The idol of Nammazhwar was brought and placed at the Feet of Namperumal marking the conclusion of the Vaikunta Ekadasi festival.

Tight security was provided at major places in the premises of the temple for the smooth conduct of the Nammazhwar Moksham.

The crowd was more than usual during the current Vaikuta Ekadasi festival particularly during the post-Ekadasi days.

According to sources, the large and unusual congregation during the third and fourth days of Raapaththu of Vaikunta Ekadasi festival, was due to government holidays. “We had to deploy additional police force for regulating the crowd,” an official said.
title: Vaikunta Ekadasi festival concludes
